name: God Eater 2
description:
God Eater 2 is an action-RPG game developed by SHIFT. It came out on 14-11-2013. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
God Eater 2 is available on PSP.
It was produced by Yosuke Tomizawa. It was directed by Kou Yoshimura. Go Shiina scored the game.
